greeting:
How to have a lovely day?
Just Smile at strangers
Just Give lots of compliments
Just Slow down and le thank you
Just Dress up cleanly and smartly
And Just wear ur perfume and attitude at all times.
Have a blessing day on the greatest festival!

There are only 2 days in a year when nothing can be done. One is ‘Yesterday’ and the other is ‘Tomorrow’. Whereas ‘Today’ is always in ur hand, to love to believe and live.
Have a very good ‘Today’!

Look for something positive in Every Day, even if some days U have to look a little harder.
Have a Have a Good Dashain Festival 2020!!

May Saraswoti Play on your tongue and lips
Lakshmi on your palms
Parvati in your heart
Durga on your arms
Wishing you and family a Happy Vijaya Dashami 2077

Look for something positive in Every Day, even if some days U have to look a little harder.
Have a Have a Good Dashain Festival 2020!!

All mornings are like paintings, U just need a little inspiration to get going… a little smile to brighten up and a message from somebody who cares to color ur day.
Have a colorful festival!

Every Day allows U to begin again. As U wake up, remind urself that ur future is not yet written. U have the ability to make it what U will.
Have a Good Dashain Festival 2020!!

May this Dashain,
light up for you.
The hopes of Happy times,
And dreams for a year full of smiles!
Wish you Happy Vijaya Dashami 2077
Moments that have been attached to my heart, forever……. Make me Miss You, even more, this Dashain Hope this Dashain brings in Good Fortune & Abounding Happiness for you! HAPPY BIJAYADASHAMI.
May the Divine of Dashain remove the darkness of ignorance and sorrow and shower wisdom, good health, peace and prosperity in your future… With Best Wishes… HAPPY DASHAIN
Wishing each one of you a very happy and prosperous Dashain. May this year brings you lots and lots of happiness in life and fulfill all your dreams. happy Dashain 2077
